statements: SELECT * FROM signature_patterns ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT signature_date, signature_id FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT signature_id, signature_image FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT signature_date FROM signature_patterns ORDER BY signature_date ASC;
SELECT signature_id, signature_image, signature_date FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY signature_date DESC;
SELECT signature_id, signature_image FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_image IS NOT NULL AND signature_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY signature_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT signature_id FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id > 5 ORDER BY signature_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT signature_id) AS total_signatures, MAX(signature_date) AS latest_signature_date FROM signature_patterns;
SELECT * FROM signature_patterns LIMIT 5;
SELECT signature_id, signature_date FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id > 10;
SELECT signature_image FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT signature_id, identification_date, identified_person_name FROM signature_identifications WHERE identification_id < 1000;
SELECT signature_id, signature_image, signature_date FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id IN (2, 5, 8);
SELECT * FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT signature_id, signature_date FROM signature_patterns WHERE signature_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT signature_id, signature_date FROM signature_patterns ORDER BY signature_date DESC;
SELECT s.signature_id, si.identified_person_name FROM signature_patterns AS s INNER JOIN signature_identifications AS si ON s.signature_id = si.signature_id;

SELECT s.signature_id, COUNT(si.identification_id) AS total_identifications FROM signature_patterns AS s LEFT JOIN signature_identifications AS si ON s.signature_id = si.signature_id GROUP BY s.signature_id ORDER BY total_identifications DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, user_id FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT signature_text, signature_date FROM SignaturePatterns WHERE signature_id = 1;

SELECT user_name, signature_text, signature_date FROM Users JOIN UserSignatures ON Users.user_id = UserSignatures.user_id JOIN SignaturePatterns ON UserSignatures.signature_id = SignaturePatterns.signature_id;
SELECT user_name, signature_text FROM Users INNER JOIN UserSignatures ON Users.user_id = UserSignatures.user_id WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_name, user_password FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, signature_text FROM Users JOIN UserSignatures ON Users.user_id = UserSignatures.user_id;
SELECT signature_id, MAX(signature_date) AS latest_date FROM SignaturePatterns GROUP BY signature_id;

SELECT user_name, signature_text, signature_date FROM Users JOIN UserSignatures ON Users.user_id = UserSignatures.user_id JOIN SignaturePatterns ON UserSignatures.signature_id = SignaturePatterns.signature_id ORDER BY signature_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_data;
SELECT id, pattern, timestamp FROM signature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, confidence_level FROM signature_identifier WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT image_id, image_format FROM signature_image WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM signature_data;
SELECT id, signature_id, pattern FROM signature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user.full_name, signature_identifier.confidence_level FROM user INNER JOIN signature_identifier ON user.user_id = signature_identifier.user_id;
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE pattern LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT user.full_name, signature_image.image_format FROM user INNER JOIN signature_image ON user.user_id = signature_image.user_id WHERE user.email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_phone='1234567890';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT u.user_name, d.department_name FROM users u JOIN user_departments ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id JOIN departments d ON ud.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT s.signature_text, u.user_name FROM signatures s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.signature_length > 100;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE signature_length > 100 ORDER BY signature_length DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_name, department_name FROM users JOIN user_departments ON users.user_id = user_departments.user_id JOIN departments ON user_departments.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) AS total_signatures FROM users JOIN signatures ON users.user_id = signatures.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING total_signatures > 3 ORDER BY total_signatures DESC;

SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM departments LEFT JOIN user_departments ON departments.department_id = user_departments.department_id GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_users DESC;
